    • browseATopic

      public static void browseATopic(DoublyLinkedList<Vocab> vocabList, Scanner keyin)
      Option 1: browseATopic,load the topics and let user to choose interested topic and display the words under the topic, display the pick-a-topic sub-menu until user enter 0. Enter 0 will go back to main menu topic name: not sorted words: sorted
      Parameters:
      vocabList - DoublyLinkedList
      keyin - Scanner

    • insertATopicBefore

      public static void insertATopicBefore(DoublyLinkedList<Vocab> vocabList, Scanner keyin)
      Option 2: after user enter 2, display the pick-a-topic sub-menu. inserting a new topic before the current top topic User will also enter words under this topic. Press Enter to quit The words user entered should be sorted
      Parameters:
      vocabList - DoublyLinkedList
      keyin - Scanner

    • insertATopicAfter

      public static void insertATopicAfter(DoublyLinkedList<Vocab> vocabList, Scanner keyin)
      Option 3: after user enter 3, display the pick-a-topic sub-menu. inserting a new topic after the current last topic User will also enter words under this topic. Press Enter to quit The words user entered should be sorted
      Parameters:
      vocabList - DoublyLinkedList
      keyin - Scanner

    • modifyATopic

      public static void modifyATopic(DoublyLinkedList<Vocab> vocabList, Scanner keyin)
      Option 5: After user enter 5, it will display pick-a-topic menu, user enter the topic choice, then display Modify-Topics-Menu : (a) add a word(sorted); (r)remove a word;(c) change a word;0 Exit
